_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
Bonjour Tremblant!

A superb day of skiing awaits you! With temperatures softening this morning, it's the perfect time to enjoy the exceptional conditions. See you at the top!

Alpine touring lovers, great news! Eight designated trails are open today: Beauchemin, Nord-Sud, Sasquatch Haut, Tour de Timber, Grand-Nord, Nansen, Sommets, and Vertigo Haut. Enjoy the experience! 

Due to variable temperatures and ongoing snowmaking, conditions may change and visibility may be reduced in some areas. We encourage you to remain vigilant and ski carefully so that you can fully enjoy your day in the mountains.

Have a wonderful day on the slopes!

Mountain safety tip of the week: People downhill have priority.

Snow fall is recorded daily at 5 a.m from mid-mountain at North Side (550 m / 1,800 ft). This data, based on 24 hours, provides a picture of on-mountain conditions. Actual accumulation may differ from the official report. Be aware of changing conditions. Lifts and trails exist in a mountain environment and may close due to weather, usage and/or special maintenance.
_inspectorSnowReport.SafetyReport:
A superb day of skiing awaits you! With temperatures softening this morning, it's the perfect time to enjoy the exceptional conditions. Alpine touring lovers, great news, eight sections are open today!
Due to variable temperatures and ongoing snowmaking, conditions may change and visibility may be reduced in some areas. We encourage you to remain vigilant and ski carefully so that you can fully enjoy your day in the mountains.
_inspectorSnowReport.SafetyReportFrench: Une superbe journée vous attend!Avec la température qui se radoucit ce matin, c’est le moment idéal de profiter des conditions.Amateurs de ski de randonnée alpine, huit sections sont ouvertes.En raison des températures variables et de l’enneigement en cours, les conditions peuvent changer et la visibilité être réduite par endroits.Nous vous invitons à rester vigilants et à skier prudemment afin de profiter pleinement de votre journée.
